content:
With all of this said, I am a salesperson working for an innovative weather company called Tomorrow.io. We help businesses make more informed decisions around the weather and its impact to operations. 

I'd like you to create an email targeting an executive buyer as described above that has a high likelihood of getting a meeting setup. Please include an engaging hook to be used for the subject line. 

However, please only write this email after I've given you the following information, which upon submitting in this format, should trigger you to write the email with the above in mind. 

Target: [Name of Person]
Position: [Role of Person]
Company: [Name of Company]
Industry: [Industry]

Optionally, if I provide you with any additional details like you find below, please do your best to incorporate them. 

For example: 
Tone: [Tone of email]
Specific Focus of Email: [Focus]

Does this make sense? Can you repeat back to me what you expect me to send you to trigger the writing of this email and furthermore describe what you will write upon this trigger occurring?
